messages.subject: Live and Learn Whale Watch Update!
messages.msgSnippet: GREAT WHALE WATCHING NEWS! Come Whale Watching with a cool bunch of Unschoolers! As part of the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference in Peabody, Massachusetts
messages.messageBody:
GREAT WHALE WATCHING NEWS!

Come Whale Watching with a cool bunch of Unschoolers!

As part of the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference in Peabody,
Massachusetts August 27-29, we were able to get a good deal with another Whale Watch
company, also out of Gloucester, for more Whale Watching tickets. The company is
Yankee Fleet, and we’ll have a link to them on the web site soon.

Tickets will be $16 per person if you send a check, or $17 per person if you
do credit card via Paypal (they charge substantial fees).

If you’d like to join us, please e-mail us at LiveandLearn2004@.... Let
me know if you’re sending a check (address below) or if you’d like to use
Paypal. If you want to use Paypal, please make sure you send me an accurate e-mail
address, and we’ll send you a Request for Payment.

The Whale Watches will take place in Gloucester, MA on Sunday afternoon after
the conference. Whale Watches will return about 5:30-6 PM. Gloucester is
about 30 minutes drive from Peabody.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
